name: Hanggg
short_description: Protect your computer from the prying and curious hands of colleague, sibling, teacher or even parent. Hanggg is the ultimate supplement to your antivirus and makes your PC 100% immune to other people. At the core of Hanggg is a sophisticated Windows Low Level Keyboard and Mouse Hook detects inactivity on your computer and disables both the keyboard and the mouse except for a special key that you can set. The only way to unlock the computer is by pressing that key after which you can   resume normal operation. Hanggg also provides you with SecuraSpace which can be toggled by pressing F6 key. By default SecuraSpace is disabled, after turning it on, you can take your cursor on the empty space on the right hand side of the taskbar and it will trap and cursor effectivly trapping both Keyboard and Mouse.
